subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|言|t1=word, speak|斥|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to accuse verbally, reinforced by 斥 meaning “accuse, blame”.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[tell]]; to [[relate]]; to [[inform]]
# to [[vent]]; to [[pour out]]
# to [[accuse]]; to [[charge]]; to [[indict]]
